department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: The Public Works and Government Services Canada has a need to purchase one (1) Agricultural Tractor, ancillary items and Integrated Logistic Support items, including training.
description: purchase one (1) Agricultural Tractor, ancillary items and Integrated Logistic Support items, including training.
full_summary:
### Agricultural Tractor - Configuration D

**NoticeType:** Request for Proposal

**ProcurementCategory:** Goods and Services

**Supply Arrangement Required:** The solicitation process is open only to suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Standing Offers (RFSA) E60HS-18AGTR/A.

**Delivery Location:** PSPC – Timiskaming Dam, 1 Route 63, Long Sault Island, Thorne, ON, P0H 2J0

**Requiremnt Summary:**
Public Works and Government Services Canada is seeking to acquire one (1) agricultural tractor, ancillary items and integrated logistic support items for use in Canada. Below are the key requirements:

* One (1) agricultural tractor with Configuration D
* Ancillary items
* Integrated logistic support items
* Training for end-users

**Delivery Schedule:**
The contractor is required to deliver the agricultural tractor and ancillary items by **June 30, 2023**. Training for the end-users must be completed within three (3) weeks following delivery.

**Trade Agreements:**
This notice may be of interest to suppliers who hold a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

**Contact Information:**
For any questions or concerns regarding this solicitation, please contact:
Cassandra Khastar, Contracting Authority
Phone: 343-550-1634
Email: [Cassandra.Khastar@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:Cassandra.Khastar@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice URL:**
This notice may be accessed on the Buyandsell.gc.ca website under the reference number **10075654**.

**Closing Date:**
* The deadline for submission of bids is **March 8, 2023, at 14:00:00** (Eastern Standard Time).
* Bidders must submit their bids to the Contracting Authority by the specified deadline.
